2064.subject: CST
2064.descrlong: Students learn writing, presentation, and critical-thinking skills within the context of the Telecommunications, Multimedia, and Applied Computing (TMAC) major. Research and project topics stem from knowledge of the TMAC design and technology curriculum. Students learn how to analyze, predict, and articulate trends in the academic, public service, and private enterprise fields of the TMAC industry. Students write two major papers and give a combination oral/multimedia presentation before both a small and large audience. (Offered every semester.)
